errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that Luigi is only compatible with Python 2.7, while it actually supports Python 3.6 and newer.
correction_candidates: Luigi is a Python (3.6+ tested) package that helps you build complex pipelines of batch jobs.
Luigi is a Python (3.6, 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, 3.12 tested) package that helps you build complex pipelines of batch jobs.
Luigi is a Python (requires >=3.6) package that helps you build complex pipelines of batch jobs.
Luigi is a Python (2.7, 3.6, 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, 3.12 tested) package that helps you build complex pipelines of batch jobs.
errors.golden_answer: Luigi is a Python (3.6, 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, 3.12 tested) package that helps you build complex pipelines of batch jobs.

errors.error_description: The command to install Luigi with TOML support is incorrect. `luigi-toml` is not the correct package name or syntax.
correction_candidates: Run ``pip install luigi[toml]`` to install Luigi with `TOML-based configs` support.
Run ``pip install luigi --extra toml`` to install Luigi with `TOML-based configs` support.
Run ``pip install luigi; pip install toml`` to install Luigi with `TOML-based configs` support.
Run ``pip install 'luigi[toml]'`` to install Luigi with `TOML-based configs` support.
errors.golden_answer: Run ``pip install luigi[toml]`` to install Luigi with `TOML-based configs` support.
